A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After going in with high hopes and a love of the franchise\, I can’t tell you how disappointed I am with this film. A story full of plot holes\, unresolved questions\, unneeded side stories and many underwhelming performances from new and older faces. We have sunk to what might end up as the worst film of the series. I appreciate those who are trying to stay positive but their are too many ridiculous scenes\, uninspired characters being played by performers who don’t seem to want to play them and and overall effort that makes Lucas’ prequels look much better. Go see the film and draw your conclusion but don’t be surprised if you leave the theater sad and disappointed.
